name: Droidimg Loader
description: Simple loader for droid kernel images
longdescription: Simple loader for droid kernel images. Based on https://github.com/nforest/droidimg/ and https://github.com/NWMonster/binja_droidimg Note that Vector 35 changes are released under the MIT license, but as the original plugins were un-licensed it's not entirely clear what their intended license status is.

installinstructions.Darwin: no special instructions, package manager is recommended
installinstructions.Linux: no special instructions, package manager is recommended
